name: DeadZ0ne!
description:
What is this?
  • DeadZ0ne is a game about a quarterback that finds himself in the middle of a zombie apocalypse! Just like a top-down run and gun, but instead of a gun you throw footballs;
  • This is still in development, so more improvements are coming soon (working on sfx and music);
How to play
  • W A S D to run away from the undead;
  • Right click to throw footballs;
Credits
  • shack library;
  • sound effects are from freesound.org;
  • based on Kyle's course game, sprites assets are from this course;
